SELECT unit_id AS unitId, total_num AS COUNT FROM data_processed_day WHERE event_id=#{eventId} AND serial_number = (SELECT MAX(serial_number) FROM data_processed_day WHERE event_id=#{eventId})
AND unit_type=#{unitType}
SELECT regid,orgname,deptname,patientname,sexcode,seedate,paykindname FROM jcyl_opr_register WHERE regstatus = '0' ORDER BY seedate desc LIMIT 100
